home.title: LATECE Portal
home.subtitle: Assistive Technology Laboratory
home.description: Promoting inclusion and accessibility through technology
home.missionText: Develop and disseminate assistive technologies that promote inclusion and autonomy for people with disabilities in educational and social environments.

about.title: About LATECE
about.subtitle: Learn about our mission, vision, and the objectives that drive us to create a more accessible future.
about.missionText: To develop and disseminate innovative assistive technologies that promote inclusion, autonomy, and quality of life for people with disabilities, fostering a collaborative learning and research environment.
about.visionText: To be a national and international reference center in research, development, and innovation in Assistive Technology, transforming society through inclusive technology.
about.researchText: Conduct research that results in effective and low-cost technological solutions.
about.educationText: Train students and professionals to work in the field of Assistive Technology.
about.communityText: Transfer knowledge and technology to society, directly benefiting the target audience.
about.innovationText: Foster an ecosystem of open innovation, collaborating with startups, companies, and other institutions.
about.justificationText1: Assistive technology is a vital field for ensuring the rights and full participation of people with disabilities in society. In Brazil, the demand for accessible and innovative solutions is growing, driven by legislation and social awareness.
about.justificationText2: LATECE emerges as a strategic response to this demand, positioning UFRN at the forefront of inclusion research. Our laboratory not only creates technology but also trains the next generation of experts in the field.
about.justificationText3: By integrating research, teaching, and community outreach, LATECE creates a virtuous cycle that benefits students, researchers, and, most importantly, the community, generating a lasting and significant social impact.
about.highlightText: We focus on open-source and open-hardware projects to maximize the reach and replicability of our solutions, ensuring that technology reaches those who need it most.
about.ctaText: Your passion for technology and inclusion can make a difference. Get to know our team and our projects.
